channels-updated: The channel list has been updated successfully.

enable.disabled: All Trick-or-Treat features have been successfully disabled for this server.
enable.enabled: You've successfully enabled all the Trick or Treat features in this server! Don't forget to set the channels to allow creepy monsters to spawn!
enable.no-change: The Trick-or-Treat features were already enabled or disabled in this server.

no-settings: You didn't set any value to update.
not-enabled: You can't use this command because this server doesn't have the Trick-or-Treat features enabled.

spawn.description: Choose between trick or treat to get a reward... or a nasty surprise.
spawn.title: {{ monster }} has appeared!

treat.field-modified: Your trick was worth the risk

trick.failed-empty: ... they didn't like it, but luckily for you, you didn't have any candies for them to steal. They won't forget your deception next time.
trick.failed-notification: Your trick failed, but you didn't have anything to lose. Well played.
trick.field-name: You tried to trick a monster
trick.success:
They didn't like it, but at least they only took some of your candies. Better luck next time.

trick.success-notification: Your inventory has been updated, you lost some items from your inventory.
